data.title: Readings in Philippine History: Edward Benrick D. Salonga, Mpa 2020
data.meta_description: RPH Lecture - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document discusses the meaning and relevance of studying history, as well as evaluating primary sources. It defines history as a chronological record of significant past events and explains how historians write history based on critical examination of sources. The document also outlines different elements of history, distinguishes between primary and secondary sources, and describes how to conduct external and internal criticisms to evaluate the credibility and authenticity of sources.
